about_the_game:
She is a little blunt and has a weird sense of humor - but she is nonetheless the best gymnast I have ever seen.

ABOUT ADAH

Age: 32
Height: 162
Blood: Jk3
Bust size: A
Origin: Unknown
Interests: Gymnastics

She doesn’t really remember her mother or if she had a real father. Circus and other artists were her family. Adah loves comfort and luxuries. As a 100% diva, she hates when her performance is being disrupted.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

This DLC unlocks the legendary champion - Adah, with 120 trust, enough to immediately reach level 10.

You will also receive an epic equipment set, allowing you to use her in missions immediately, along with a legendary look for Adah (or its equivalent in nanites if you already have it).

And of course, by purchasing this DLC, you are supporting us. Thank you!

This DLC is non-refundable after activation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Lesbian Sex
- Android Sex
- Consensual BDSM and bondage
- Punishment and instances of non-consensual sexual activities
